items.content_html: Lumen Dashboard is a lightweight data visualization platform using the Lumen micro-framework. It provides real-time insights through customizable widgets and responsive design for desktop and mobile. With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.

With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight weather application that allows users to check the current weather for any city. The app fetches real-time weather data from the OpenWeather API and displays temperature and weather conditions.
